name: Cubic Crush Streamer Showdown
description:
Come and prove your skills in Cubic Crush Streamer Showdown! This 4D Tetris style game is played in the rooms of your favorite Youtubers and offers various difficulty levels and missions to complete. Use powerful PowerUps during the game to gain an advantage and advance even faster! Additionally, in our interactive Twitch mode, your viewers can send you commands and help you succeed (or lose). Unlock more rooms as you progress, visit them with the Tour mode and become the king of Cubic Crush in this exciting challenge!

- 14 unique rooms

- 40 unlockable missions

- 6 powerful PowerUps

- Twitch mode

- Tour mode

- 5 difficulty modes

- Beautiful, colorful and stylized design!

Download Cubic Crush Streamer Showdown and join the fun now!
